verses.verse: Praise Jah! Blessed is the man who fears Jehovah, delighting greatly in His commands.
His seed will be mighty on the earth; the generation of the upright ones will be blessed;
wealth and riches in his house; and his righteousness is standing forever.
Light rises in the darkness to the upright ones; he is gracious and full of pity, and of righteousness.
Good is a man showing favor and lending; he will measure his matters with justice.
For he shall not be shaken forever; the righteous one shall be for a remembrance forever.
He shall not be afraid of evil news; his heart is fixed, trusting in Jehovah.
His heart is upheld; he shall not be afraid until he looks on his oppressors.
He has scattered; he has given to the needy ones; his righteousness is standing forever; his horn shall be lifted up with honor.
The wicked one shall see and be indignant; he shall gnash his teeth and melt; the desire of the wicked ones shall perish.
